DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to determine the extent of effect of gemfibrozil on the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of mitiglinide.
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study of Mitiglinide and Gemfibrozil
DOC.criteria: nonsmoker Body mass index (BMI) of 1928 kg/m2 no relevant food allergies any subject for whom gemfibrozil is contraindicated any subject with a history of hypoglycemia or who tend to get easily hypoglycemic clinically significant history of or current abnormality or disease of any organ system
